thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 06 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-New Relic Q3 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.14

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-New Relic Q3 GAAP Loss Per Share $0.14
text:
Feb 6 (Reuters) - New Relic Inc:
* NEW RELIC ANNOUNCES THIRD QUARTER OF FISCAL YEAR 2018 RESULTS
* Q3 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.05 * Q3 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.14 * Q3 REVENUE ROSE 35 PERCENT TO $91.8 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $351.6 MILLION TO $353.1 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 NON-GAAP NET LOSS PER BASIC SHARE OF BETWEEN $0.04 AND $0.06
* SEES Q4 REVENUE BETWEEN $95.0 MILLION AND $96.5 MILLION * SEES Q4 NON-GAAP NET INCOME PER SHARE OF BETWEEN $0.04 AND $0.05
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.01, REVENUE VIEW $94.9 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.22, REVENUE VIEW $348.9 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
